subject: 蓝精灵们带着宝石返回山巅
detail: Animated style, warm and heartwarming scene: Blue Smurfs flying gracefully through the sky carrying glowing gems on their backs, surrounded by floating light orbs and bioluminescent mushrooms; then they descend smoothly onto the mountain peak; finally, the gems emit a soft, radiant, golden glow that bathes the entire mountaintop in gentle light. Soft wind rustling through alpine grasses and distant joyful laughter fill the air. Horizontal pan shot. Background sound: gentle wind and cheerful laughter. Voiceover says in Chinese "他们带着宝石回到山巅"
image_detail: (动画风格) 小精灵们在山巅上空飞行，背着发光的宝石，周围有漂浮的光球和发光的蘑菇
narration: 他们带着宝石回到山巅
